text: Duje Bonačić (10 April 1929 – 24 January 2020) was a Croatian rower. He won a gold medal in the coxless four event at the 1952 Summer Olympics.Duje Bonačić . sports-reference.com Bonačić was born in Split. Bonačić died in Split on 24 January 2020 after a short illness, aged 90. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Split Category:Olympic gold medalists for Croatia Category:Olympic gold medalists for Yugoslavia Category:Rowers
title: Duje Bonačić
